PageWidgetPortable.Title: Evolução das contas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <AmCharstAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_GRAPH_EVOLUCAO.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause> ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR (@FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL <> @FILIAL)) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.USUARIOEXECUTIVO IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.USUARIOEXECUTIVO NOT IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) )</CriteriaWhereClause> <ChartType>Column</ChartType> <ChartHeight>400</ChartHeight> <ChartDefinition></ChartDefinition> </AmCharstAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Tipo de tarefa / Mês
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <AmCharstAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_GRAPH_TIPOTAREFA.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause> ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL <> @FILIAL)) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.USUARIOEXECUTIVO IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.USUARIOEXECUTIVO NOT IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) )</CriteriaWhereClause> <ChartType>Column</ChartType> <ChartHeight>400</ChartHeight> <ChartDefinition></ChartDefinition> </AmCharstAttributes>
